channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drainage/Pothole üï≥Ô∏è Developing, 13th August
item.description:
A resident has reported the following to me. Has anyone else noticed the potential new problem/culvert on New road? If driving in towards Woodmancote then it is level with the triangular horse sign on the other side of the road... If sorted soon may prevent similar closures to last time.?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are dead branches in the trees along the whole of Sydenham Road North, the trees are also incredibly high and have not been pollarded in years! We are concerned that a branch will break off and fall into our driveway damaging our vehicles, 13th August
item.description:
Sydenham Road North and Cranham Road Cheltenham We live at 26 Sydenham Road North

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Sydenham Road North, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blockage, 13th August
item.description:
The drains outside number 16 and 18 Cleeve road are blocked. Note: during heavy rain the runoff water from the lawns has resulted in number 16 and 18 being flooded if this drain is blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
